title: Evil Angel
description: EVIL ANGEL. RD LARSON. BEWRITE BOOKS. A beautiful girl, tortured by insane jealousy and twisted love, is possessed by an Evil Angel who leads her on a path of manic violence and death in a bid to crush a real love story. Not for the weak-stomached, this is an fast paced, sharp adult thriller full of action and excitement.
author: R.D. Larson
